title: Kazakh Phenom Provisionally Banned for CERA, Fired by Astana Qazaqstan Devo Team
content:
Ilkhan Dostiyev, 22, tested positive for CERA during a doping control this summer. His team states he admitted use of the drug.

Read the full article at Kazakh Phenom Provisionally Banned for CERA, Fired by Astana Qazaqstan Devo Team on Velo.
author: ahood
